title: Ferguson protests: calmer scenes after night of violence â as it happened | US news | The Guardian

text: this blog has ended .
coverage will continue with tom mccarthy over at a new blog page .
here 's a summary of how things stand as we approach dawn in ferguson .

the police officer who shot dead an unarmed black 18-year-old in ferguson , missouri , leading to weeks of unrest and reviving a national debate about law enforcement and race in america , will not face state criminal charges .
a grand jury in st louis county declined to indict darren wilson for killing michael brown on 9 august , following an altercation after the officer stopped him and a friend for jaywalking .
fires are still smouldering in ferguson after the verdict prompted chaotic scenes and the worst violence in the city since brown 's death .
at least 25 fires were started , 13 people were injured and 29 arrests were made .
relative calm was restored after more national guard troops arrived in ferguson .
dozens of troops dressed in riot gear were deployed .
a no-fly zone was imposed over ferguson after reports of shooting in the air .
the police chief said he personally heard 150 gunshots during the protests .
several largely peaceful protests took part in a number of cities across the us .
the worst violence outside ferguson was in oakland , california , where hundreds of demonstrators blocked a major road , fires were started and police fired rubber bullets .
in new york blood-red paint was thrown at the police commissioner .
barack obama appealed for calm and an acceptance of the verdict .
he said the problems behind such cases could be fixed , but not by throwing bottles or hurting people .

the president 's appeal was overshadowed , writes dan roberts : one half of tvs in millions of prime-time american living rooms carried words of calm that already seemed too late ; the other filled with frightening scenes of anger that many fear will not easily subside .
michael brown 's family said they were profoundly disappointed by the grand jury 's verdict .
in a statement the family urged protesters to remain peaceful .
here is the grand jury 's full report , here is a gallery of images from ferguson and elsewhere in the us , and below is our most recent video of events overnight .
riots in ferguson
the grand jury decision prompted protests in a number of cities including los angeles and new york .
here is a roundup of events outside ferguson .
new york there were marches on union square and times square where one protester threw blood-red paint at the police chief william bratton , splattering his face .
protesters expressed their continued rage against police violence in new york as well as ferguson , according to the new york post .
oakland , california the worst violence outside ferguson was in oakland , where hundreds of demonstrators blocked a major road , fires were started and police fired rubber bullets .
objects , including rocks , were thrown at officers during the protest , the la times reports .
chicago several hundred people took part in a march chanting whose streets ?
our streets , according to the chicago tribune .
seattle in seattle police used pepper spray to try to prevent protesters blocking a freeway .
philadelphia at least two people were arrested when protesters tried to block a road , but the demonstration was completely peaceful according to the police .
washington in the capital a small group of people marched on the white house .
they carried signs and chanted justice for michael brown , ap reports .
this map pinpoints the main arson attacks in the wake of the verdict .
chaos broke out on ferguson 's west florissant avenue after it was announced that darren wilson would not be charged for shooting dead michael brown , write paul lewis and jon swaine in ferguson .
it feels like someone took a pitchfork , stuck it in a fire and put it right in my stomach and then twisted it , the man in the bandana said of the grand jury 's decision .
outside papa john 's pizza , a man in a military-style balaclava scuffled with a woman who was trying to stop him from breaking in .
six men climbed out of the broken window of the next building , a tax office .
across the road , people were emptying fashions r boutique .
thick black smoke billowing from three blazing auto parts garages blurred the silhouettes of looters .
seconds later , three armoured personnel carriers marked swat emerged from the smoke .
officers carrying assault weapons clung on to the sides .
police officers in green military-style fatigues pointed their rifles at men and women who scattered into side streets .
two looters were pinned to the ground .
we were just looking inside , one of them , a woman , told the armed police .
one officer shouted at a reporter : back up !
this is a secure area .
it was one of the few examples on monday of police exerting control over crowds of mostly young men and women who rampaged through the streets of ferguson , missouri .
you can read their full report from ferguson here .
a firefighter arrives to inspect a pizza business set ablaze in ferguson .
maury/epa
a fire official in ferguson said at least 25 fires were started in the city following the verdict , local broadcaster kmov reports .
several north county businesses we set on fire , including many that were looted in august protests .
some of the businesses burned include a walgreens store , a little caesars , beauty town , jc wireless , o'reilly auto parts and an auto zone .
later in the night , a conoco gas station was set on fire and several cars on a nearby auto lot were burned ferguson 's asst .
fire chief told news 4 at least 25 fires were set throughout the night .
before the fires were set , police said multiple businesses in ferguson were looted , including beauty world , walgreens , o'reilly 's , sam 's market , and others .
local police said at least a dozen fires were started .
firefighters work to extinguish a blaze at a little caesar 's restaurant in ferguson .
/rex

documents.title: injuries
text: despite the level of unrest there have been relatively few reports of injuries .
st louis county police chief , jon belmar , said the police had not caused any serious injuries , as far as he knew .
but earlier , reporters shared footage of a woman said to have been knocked unconscious outside the police department in ferguson , as police fire teargas .
st louis post-dispatch health reporter samantha liss says local hospitals are reporting 13 injuries including two involving gunshot wounds .
samantha liss ( @ samanthann ) as of 1:25 a.m. : area hospitals report a total of 13 injuries , including two with gunshot wounds .
she also reports that two teenagers were treated for teargas .
samantha liss ( @ samanthann ) two teenagers treated after exposure to tear gas .
they have been released from ssm cardinal glennon children 's medical center .

documents.title: reports of 'calm '
text: plummeting temperatures , tiredness ( it 's just after 4am in missouri now ) and the arrival of the national guard appear to have calmed tensions in ferguson .
emily rau ( @ emilyrau ) s. florissant reopened about 45 mins ago .
calm and quiet now .
# kmov paul hampel ( @ phampel ) police advancing north on west flor .
suddenly very quiet here streets empty .
jon swaine ( @ jonswaine ) relative calm at ferguson pd .
twice as many cops as protesters .
just shouting
the music world has responded with with dismay at the grand jury verdict , writes ben beaumont-thomas .
q-tip , macklemore , rihanna , and pharrell have all voiced their frustration .
this map shows the location of ferguson , a suburb of st louis , missouri .
firefighters in ferguson are still dealing with a number of burning buildings and cars after a spate of arson attacks in the city .
laura hettiger kmov ( @ laurakhettiger ) family dollar in # ferguson still burning .
firefighters just got on scene @ twitterid matt pearce ( @ mattdpearce ) everything must go '' rt @ twitterid : beauty supply shop burning at w flor and chambers .
local broadcaster kmov has mapped the businesses that have been targeted .
kmov ( @ kmov ) moments after the grand jury decision was announced , protesters set fire to area businesses # thedecision
the guardian 's jon swaine , who is in ferguson , reckons there have been many more than 29 arrests .
jon swaine ( @ jonswaine ) looking like that arrest total of 29 for tonight is going to end up much higher .
several mass arrests at looting sites # ferguson david carson ( @ pdpj ) # fergsuon 16 people arrested some for looting , others for trespassing , one gun recovered
police have also fired some form of rubber bullets at protesters in los angeles following the grand jury 's decision , according to new video and photographic reports .
gadi schwartz ( @ gadinbcla ) canisters fired by # lapd frank shyong ( @ frankshyong ) this is one of the rounds lapd fired into the ground to disperse the # michaelbrown crowd .
hand model : @ twitterid protesters briefly shut down the northbound and southbound lanes of interstate 110 , ap reports , citing the city news service .
people stood and lay in the northbound lanes and the center divider .
california highway patrol officers declared an unlawful assembly .

after midnight , about 100 police officers wearing riot gear fired hard foam projectiles into the ground to disperse about 50 protesters on pico boulevard in downtown los angeles , the los angeles times reported .
st louis county police claim the level of violence in ferguson following the verdict was worse than than the unrest in august after brown 's killing .
in a facebook update it said : what we saw tonight was much worse than what we saw any night in august .
bricks were thrown at police officers , two st. louis county police cars were set on fire and police seized an automatic weapon .
a policeman walks past a burning police car during a protest in ferguson , missouri .
news agency/rex
police have fired some form of rubber bullets or plastic pellets at protesters in oakland , california , according to reports .

not frantz fanon ( @ violentfanon ) this is what they are shooting us with , among other things it 's hard as a rock # oakland # ferguson # ftp in august activists in missouri claimed the unrest was inflamed by police responding in a military style by firing both teargas and rubber bullets .
the full grand jury report on its decision explaining its decision not to indict police officer darren wilson for the fatal shooting of michael brown , is available here .
the grand jury of seven men and five women met on 25 days over three months and heard more than 70 hours of testimony

documents.title: 29 arrests made in ferguson
text: so far there have been 29 arrests in the worst unrest in ferguson since august , according to the st louis police .
st. louis county pd ( @ stlcountypd ) 29 arrest so far around ferguson , says the unified command # fergusondecision
russia appears to be enjoying a moment of schadenfreude over ferguson , according to the guardian 's moscow correspondent shaun walker .
he points out that the foreign ministry 's human rights ombudsman has just released a series of smug tweets .
here 's a translation of two of the tweets : racial and ethnic tensions continue to rise in us society .
it 's about time the us authorities paid attention to this rather than focusing on lecturing the rest of the world on human rights .
konstantin dolgov ( @ kkdolgov ) ð ð°ñð¾ð²ñðµ ð¸ ññð½ð¸ñðµñðºð°ñ ð½ð°ð¿ññð¶ðµð½ð½ð¾ñññ ð² ð°ð¼ðµñð¸ðºð°ð½ñðºð¾ð¼ ð¾ð±ñðµññð²ðµ ð¿ñð¾ð´ð¾ð » ð¶ð°ðµñ ð½ð°ñð°ññð°ññ .
earlier there were multiple reports of police firing teargas outside the ferguson police department .
now video has emerged on fusion.net of a woman , said to be unconscious , being carried to safety as police fired teargas at the crowd .
st louis county police chief jon belmar says he has witnessed hearing 150 gunshots .
we were really hoping for peaceful protests ¦ i did n't see a lot of peaceful protests , he told reporters .
lisa brown ( @ lisabrownstl ) st. louis county 's belmar said he personally heard at least 150 gunshots tonight

documents.title: national guard arrives in ferguson
text: troops from the national guard have begun arriving in ferguson according to several reports and clips .

patrick dehahn ( @ patrickdehahn ) national guard spotted by ferguson pd building after mayor called on governor for deployment /from @ twitterid emily rau ( @ emilyrau ) national guard set up at hampton village and the target across the street in south city .
# kmov earlier missouri governor jay nixon ordered more national guardsmen into ferguson .
at least a dozen buildings have been set on fire by protesters in and around ferguson , police have announced .
video footage shows a burning building in dellwood to the east of ferguson .
ryan j. reilly ( @ ryanjreilly ) building burns at chambers and west florissant in dellwood # ferguson several cars have also been torched according to dramatic video footage .
a car dealership in dellwood appears to be the worst hit .
paul hampel ( @ phampel ) at least a dozen vehicles ablaze at auto buy credit in dellwood kmov ( @ kmov ) a dellwood car lot and gas station ablaze right now .
# ferguson unrest continues into early morning hours .

documents.title: opening summary
text: welcome to our continuing coverage of the aftermath of a grand jury 's decision not to indict ferguson police officer darren wilson for the shooting dead in august of the black teenager michael brown .
the verdict has sparked violent protests in ferguson despite barack obama 's appeal for calm and for the public to accept the decision .

here 's a summary of where things stand : the police officer who shot dead an unarmed black 18-year-old in ferguson , missouri , leading to weeks of unrest and reviving a national debate about law enforcement and race in america , will not face state criminal charges .
a grand jury in st louis county declined to indict darren wilson for killing michael brown on 9 august , following an altercation after the officer stopped him and a friend for jaywalking .
the national guard has been ordered into ferguson after violent protests , including arson and shooting .
the request was made by the mayor james knowles .
barack obama has appealed for calm and an acceptance of the verdict .
he said the problems behind such cases could be fixed , but not by throwing bottles or hurting people .
michael brown 's family said they were profoundly disappointed by the grand jury 's verdict .
in a statement the family urged protesters to remain peaceful .
you can follow how the details of the verdict unfolded and all the initial reaction here .

key_events.text:
8.13am GMT
08:13
National guard arrives in Ferguson

bulletin.text: Grand jury declines to indict Darren Wilson over Michael Brown shooting.
Decision sparks violent civil unrest in Ferguson.
Police fire teargas at protesters as national guard deployed.
Obama calls for acceptance of grand jury's decision.
